title: Double Potion Healing
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1"
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
|Rank||Effect||Flavor
|-
|1||Potions are twice as effective at restoring [[HP]] and [[MP]].||You gain doubled healing and magic from potions.
|-
| colspan="3" |
The potions affected are [[potion of curing|curing]], [[potion of heal wounds|heal wounds]], [[potion of ambrosia|ambrosia]], and [[potion of magic|magic]]. Potions of [[potion of mutation|mutation]] are also slightly improved.
|-
| colspan="3" |
'''Species notes:''' [[Oni]] start with this mutation. Exclusive to [[Oni]].
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
| colspan="3" |
[[Good_mutations|Good mutation]]
|}
